bot_welcome:
Hi I'm %{name}. I can delete messeges in your group based on users' poll
Just send @%{username} as a reply to the message you want to delete
question_string: Shall I delete this message by %{name}?
question_string_ban: Shall I ban %{name} and delete this message?
main_menu: Choose an option from below list
vote_menu: Choose minimum number of votes to make a decision
timeout_menu: Choose time after which closed poll should be deleted
